mapper.insert: insert into al_activity (activity_id, activity_name, activity_rule, activity_statue, create_date) values (#{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityStatue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select activity_id, activity_name, activity_rule, activity_statue, create_date from al_activity
